CHANGES
=======

2.0 (2023-02-17)
----------------

- Add support for Python 3.9, 3.10, 3.11.

- Drop support for Python 2.7, 3.5, 3.6.

- Fix warning in setup.py.


1.1 (2019-12-03)
----------------

- Explicitly support and test for Python 2.7, 3.7 and 3.8.


1.0 (2011-09-22)
----------------

- first release.
